Description:
Local accounts, System Owner/User discovery using operating systems utilities

Author: Timur Zinniatullin, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Local Accounts Discovery
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and (command like '% /c%' and command like '%dir %' and command like '%\users\%')) and  not command like '% rmdir %') or (((process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe') and command like '%user%') and  not (command like '%/domain%' or command like '%/add%' or command like '%/delete%' or command like '%/active%' or command like '%/expires%' or command like '%/passwordreq%' or command like '%/scriptpath%' or command like '%/times%' or command like '%/workstations%')) or ((process_path like '%\whoami.exe' or process_path like '%\quser.exe' or process_path like '%\qwinsta.exe') or (process_path like '%\wmic.exe' and (command like '%useraccount%' and command like '%get%')) or (process_path like '%\cmdkey.exe' and command like '% /l%')))
